translation: Thank you for your presence in TnDao!
transcript: 感谢各位听道的观众们！

translation: You can see the first page of my PPT.
transcript: 大家看一看我的ppt的第一页。

translation: It is a red brick.
transcript: 我是一块红色的砖。

translation: As the first speaker today, I hope I can throw a sprat to catch a mackerel.
transcript: 今天第一个来演讲，抛砖引玉。

translation: I know for whom you are here today.
transcript: 我知道大家今天为谁而来。

translation: For a sweet piece of jade, right?
transcript: 这甜蜜蜜的一块玉，对不对？

translation: But I'm a brick and I love things like bricks.
transcript: 所以呢我呢就是一块砖，但我特别热爱砖这样的东西。

translation: Look at this brick, doesn't it have a special spirit?
transcript: 大家看一眼它，它是不是有一种特别二的精神？

translation: Seeing it, we probably get a sudden urge to throw it at someone.
transcript: 一种可以随时可以拍出去的一种冲动。

translation: It is not only the totem of doers like us, but also a multi-tasking hero.
transcript: 它是我们行动者的图腾，而且它是我们的跨界英雄。

translation: It can build a house and can be a tool to hit others.
transcript: 因为它可以造房子，还可以随手抄起来拍人。

translation: So the brick represents a spirit of the new era, a power of action, and an urge of a sudden.
transcript: 所以砖代表了一种新时代的一种精神，一种行动的力量，一种刹那间的冲动。

translation: Well, what is the theme of my speech today?
transcript: 那我今天演讲的是什么呢？

translation: Not Ready Yet.
transcript: 《还没准备好》。

translation: And what do I mean?
transcript: 那那又是什么呢？

translation: Procrastination.
transcript: 拖延。

translation: I think everyone here has procrastination issues, right?
transcript: 每一位都拖延过，对吗？

translation: From writing compositions in school to writing files in companies, or making PPTs to clients and giving speeches on the stage, procrastination has leeched its way into our lives at some point.
transcript: 从小的时候写作文到给老板写文件，到给客户写ppt，到上台演讲。

translation: I’m going to tell you the reason I come here today.
transcript: 我跟你说为什么有今天我这个演讲。

translation: This is all because of Jiang Changjian, a famous host.
transcript: 是因为我们我们著名的一位主持人叫蒋昌建。

translation: We invited him a long time ago to prepare a speech for TnDao, but he prepared for two whole years.
transcript: 呃我们请他预备听道的讲演，很久以前，结果他整整准备了两年。

translation: We invited him again, "Mr. Jiang, are you ready?"
transcript: 我们再问他：“蒋大哥，您准备好了吗？”

translation: "Eh, I'm not ready yet."
transcript: “呃，我还没准备好。”

translation: Then, he ended up ready for The Brain.
transcript: 然后他就准备到最强大脑上去了。

translation: Yet as we can see from Mr. Jiang, winner of the “Best Debater” title in the first International Varsity Debate in Singapore, is caught up in a vortex of "not ready yet".
transcript: 连蒋昌建这样的“狮城舌辩”的最佳辩手，他都纠缠在一个还没准备好的一个漩涡里。

translation: What are we facing and what are we afraid of?
transcript: 我们究竟遇到了什么，我们究竟在害怕些什么？

translation: Just now, Qin Chang said that I used to be a magazine editor-in-chief.
transcript: 刚才秦畅说到我以前是做杂志的主编出版人的。

translation: One of the things that happened to me a lot in this career was that many writers procrastinated until the deadline roared toward them.
transcript: 在我这个时职业生涯中经常遇到一件事，我的作者拖稿，天呐拖起来太厉害了。

translation: Actually, I was an editor-in-chief of a music magazine.
transcript: 我曾经遇到过，因为我曾经是一个音乐杂志的主编。

translation: I remember there was a famous music reviewer, and his writing was very good.
transcript: 我当时有一个非常著名的音乐评论人他的稿写的非常得好。

translation: So I invited him to write an article.
transcript: 我就去约他。

translation: But when the deadline came,we call it "deadline" because we are so dead if writers do not turn in their works, for I would be unable to print the magazine.
transcript: 结果了到了这个截稿日，我们称为deadline，因为真的是dead，如果你再不交出来的话我后面实在没办法印了。

translation: So I called him, but he didn't answer the phone.
transcript: 然后我给他打电话，不接电话。

translation: I looked for him by all means, and finally I caught up with him in the middle of the night, and he said, "Sorry, Jian Fang, my wife has breast cancer."
transcript: 各种去找他，最后他在深夜里面我还是在追他，他说：“哎呀不行，简昉，我老婆生生乳腺癌了。”

translation: I said well, your wife's life is much more important.
transcript: 我说诶这这不行了，我我我我一份稿子我，你太太的生命。

translation: It’s okay, just go and take care of her.
transcript: 对吧，你赶紧吧算了。

translation: Finally, I had to select another article to make up for this.
transcript: 我随便拿了篇稿子补上。

translation: I thought what kind of editor-in-chief am I, and why did I bring such bad luck to him?
transcript: 我说我这是什么主编，我为什么给大家带去这样的厄运哪？

translation: I can't ask for his writings anymore, otherwise his life......
transcript: 我不能再我不能再约他的稿了，否则他的生命……

translation: You know it's not true, right?
transcript: 大家知道不是真的对吧？

translation: In fact, he is brillant and is never a man who has nothing to write.
transcript: 呃这样的一个非常优秀有才华的人，他并不是一个写不出稿件的人。

translation: He just got a disease called procrastination, which we all suffer from to a degree.
transcript: 他生了一种病叫拖延症，这个我们多多少少每个人都有。

translation: So what is it that makes us so fearful and keeps us from fulfilling our promises?
transcript: 那么如此让我们恐惧，如此让我们不能完成我们的诺言的究竟是什么？

translation: Okay, look at this word, it is a very big "I".
transcript: 好，这个词，一个非常非常大的“我”字。

translation: We are afraid of ourselves, the one that we can see in the mirror after washing our faces every day.
transcript: 我们害怕是我们自己，就是那个镜子里面你非常熟悉每天洗完脸以后那个自己。

translation: It is known that there is a Buddhist term called "egocentrism".
transcript: 大家知道佛教里面有有一个词叫“我执”。

translation: As human beings, it is hard for us to free ourselves from egocentrism.
transcript: 作为我们人类很难破的在佛教里面说是“我执”。

translation: We may get caught up in pursuing money, in focusing too much on our children, or in a certain kind of love, but the hardest for us is to lift us out of and above ourselves.
transcript: 你可以执念于钱，你可以执念于你的孩子，你可以执念某一种爱，但是到了最高的境界你最难破的是你自己。

translation: We often have a kind of fear, just as a Chinese proverb goes, "To tell a horse from a mule, just pull it out and walk it awhile”.
transcript: 所以我们经常会有这样的一种恐惧，是骡子是马拉出来溜溜对吧。

translation: We should be such a horse with the style of Mr. Jiang.
transcript: 我们应该是这样么一匹马，大家想象蒋老师的风范，是这样的。

translation: But sometimes we may doubt ourselves.
transcript: 但是有的时候想。

translation: We may think that I am not ready yet, I am not handsome enough, I still have fat on my waist, or other reasons to prove that we are not ready yet.
transcript: 哎呀我没有准备好，我还不够帅，我今天腰上还有些呃赘肉，我怎么样，没有准备好。

translation: So what exactly are we afraid of?
transcript: 那我害怕的是什么呢？

translation: What we fear is our true selves.
transcript: 我们害怕的真实的自己。

translation: But the shortcomings of the so-called true self may actually be magnified by our fear.
transcript: 所谓真实自己，其实这种恐惧的心理，也许你放大了你的缺点。

translation: "To tell the difference between a horse and a mule, just walk them".
transcript: 是骡子是马拉出来溜溜。

translation: You hope to be a horse, an ideal horse, handsome, popular, respected, and having a good image in other's eyes.
transcript: 你希望你是马，你理想中你是马，英俊的，受人欢迎的，受人尊重的，贴完标签我是高大上的。

translation: But the truth is, deep down in your heart, you always feel like you're going to make a fool of yourself.
transcript: 但事实上，可能在你内心深处，你总觉得自己会出来出丑。

translation: This fear holds you so tightly that you keep saying "I'm not ready yet".
transcript: 那这种恐惧深深地拉住了你，于是你一直说：我没有准备好。

translation: Yes, this could be what the procrastination fundamentally concerns about.
transcript: 是的，这可能是拖延心理症的这么一个基本的问题。

translation: But as we are here today, we should look higher.
transcript: 但是我们今天站在这里，我们应该更高的往上看。

translation: You can have a read of Procrastination: Why You Do It, What to Do About It Now, a really nice book.
transcript: 《拖延心理学》那本书写得非常好，大家去可以看看。

translation: As modern people, we suffer from the so-called inner fear caused by self-reflection, but should we have a higher wisdom beyond our ourselves?
transcript: 所谓的现代人的自我梳理造成的内心的恐惧，但是超越之上我们是不是应该有一种更高的智慧呢？

translation: In other words, how do we accept the imperfect self and the imperfect present?
transcript: 也就说是的，我们怎么样接纳不完美的自己和不完美的现在？

translation: We can win by taking action from now on.
transcript: 从现在开始行动我们可以获得胜利。

translation: There is a wisdom called "2 versus 1" or "2 out of 3", which means to win three out of five or two out of three.
transcript: 有一种智慧叫做2比1，三胜两负对不对，五战里面只要三胜赢就可以，三战里面两战赢就可以。

translation: We all know the Tian Ji's Horse Racing Strategy.
transcript: 那么田忌赛马的故事大家都知道。

translation: All types of his horses, the superior ones, the average ones and the inferior ones are all weaker than that of the King Wei.
transcript: 上马中马下马，每一匹马都比齐威王的要差。

translation: So they lost all three races.
transcript: 一直比三战三输。

translation: What did Tian Ji do?
transcript: 田忌做了什么？

translation: He used his inferior horse to race with the king's best horse, his average horse to race with the king's inferior horse, and his best horse to race with the king's average horse.
transcript: 拼掉一条马，然后用自己的上马去比齐威王的中马，然后把自己的中马去比齐威王的下马。

translation: So he won two races out of three and finally he won.
transcript: 这个时候两胜一负，田忌赢了。

translation: With the development of Internet digitization, it seems completely natural for us to make mistakes, so we don't have to pursue absolute perfection in our work and life.
transcript: 所以在我们现在的工作当中，在我们现在的生活当中，在我们互联网数字化的发展当中，我们又急剧地试错的可能的时候，我们不要追求完全的完美。

translation: We can even get an inspiration from such an old story, i.e., we are horses, but we are Tian Ji's horses.
transcript: 甚至我们从这么古老的一个故事中得到一个启发，我们是骡子是马，对，我们是马，但是是田忌的马。

translation: What can we learn from this inspiration?
transcript: 它给我们的什么呢？

translation: A superior rationality.
transcript: 给我们一种更高的理性。

translation: General rationality means courage and hard work.
transcript: 普通理性是勇敢勇敢努力努力。

translation: It is like many Chinese parents who ask their children to get high scores in Chinese, Maths, English, even all subjects, right?
transcript: 就像我们的家长一样，语文也要好好，数学也要好，英语也要好，一门门地去拼，对不对？

translation: But in today, many smart people have discovered a truth from the story of Tian Ji.
transcript: 但是现在的这个时代，田忌赛马其实在我们这时代里面有很多聪明人已经发现了这个真理。

translation: They found that we can strategically give up something.
transcript: 我们可以策略性的放弃。

translation: I can use my inferior horse to race with the king's best horse.
transcript: 我用我的下马，去拼掉国王的那匹上马。

translation: So in this case, my move is strategic, smart, and offensive.
transcript: 于是在这样的这个状态当中我这次放弃是有策略的，是聪明的、是进攻性的。

translation: Then, we need to seek comparative advantages rather than absolute advantages.
transcript: 然后寻找相对优势而不是绝对优势。

translation: Is there anyone know about this girl?
transcript: 所以大家看？

translation: Who is she?
transcript: 这谁？

translation: She is Ma Jiajia.
transcript: 马佳佳。

translation: Have you ever been to her shop?
transcript: 大家要有去过她的店吗？

translation: Well, many people including her classmates said that she is not a big deal.
transcript: 呵呵，很多人说包括她的同学，她同学说有什么了不起。

translation: They think SmarTao, a shop run by their other two classmates, is much better than hers.
transcript: 我们有另外两个同学办的那个店叫大象的比她好多了。

translation: Yes, we have to admit that Ma Jiajia’s shop is worse than SmarTao when it comes to the size of shop, the suppliers and services.
transcript: 对，比门店，比供货商，比服务，也许马佳佳的都是差的。

translation: But the girl bravely dressed herself up like this, encouraging people to enjoy sexual health products which traditionally embarrassed people to speak out.
transcript: 但是这个女孩子勇敢地把自己打扮成这个样子，让大家遮遮掩掩的性保健品变成说去享受。

translation: When you talk about the shop size, the business, and the costs, she tells you about the spiritual realm.
transcript: 所以你跟她谈门店，你跟她谈生意，你跟她谈成本，她跟你谈精神境界。

translation: She has bypassed your old path and the old rules of price comparison, and has carved a new path.
transcript: 让开你原来的一个路径，让开你原来一个比价的规则，她找到了一个新的一条路径。

translation: That is the comparative advantage I just said.
transcript: 相对优势。

translation: I can say that no one in China has been more successful than her in the traditional field of sexual medicare.
transcript: 我可以说在中国没有人比她更成功，在性医疗保险这个传统的名字大帽子之下。

translation: Many have questioned her for the low sales, but she has marketing power, a new term.
transcript: 很多人说她没庙卖掉多少，她都没有怎么样，但是她现在具有的这么样一种新鲜的这种名称，那种营销力。

translation: If there is a far-sighted person who can help her build a sound, mature logistics system, she will generate great business value.
transcript: 如果有眼光的人就直接帮她建好物流，直接把她建好下面的这所谓成熟的那一套系统，这个一定会有很大的商业价值。

translation: Another example, Huang Taiji, a small fast food restaurant specializing in Chinese pancake, used the same strategy as Ma Jiajia did.
transcript: 当然，我们还可以知道那个卖煎饼的黄太吉，一样。

translation: Their food sucks, I tasted.
transcript: 东西也不好吃我亲自去吃过。

translation: But I have a lot of respect for the founder, who is a boss exploring aliens and selling pancakes.
transcript: 但是我非常非常地尊敬这个人，这是一个探索外星人的老板，一个卖煎饼果子的。

translation: He is very good at marketing himself on Weibo.
transcript: 但是他在他的微博中极其会营销自我。

translation: For example, he asks his wife to deliver a 12-yuan pancake in Mercedes-Benz.
transcript: 让他的太太开着大奔，啊去送那么十二块钱的一个煎饼果子。

translation: So what does it mean?
transcript: 这是什么？

translation: Is it about the absolute advantage?
transcript: 这是在比绝对优势吗？

translation: Absolutely not!
transcript: 没有！

translation: In today’s Internet world, if we can find a comparative advantage when we start a business and rapidly seize the market, maybe we can get a greater advantage.
transcript: 在我们今天的世界里面，在我们创业的世界里面，在我们的互联网的世界里面，相对优势快速出击，也许你能获得更大的优势。

translation: If so, we can be Tian Ji's horses.
transcript: 你就是田忌的马。

translation: So, don't wait for perfection, nor for everything to be ready.
transcript: 不要等待完美，不要等待所有的东西都准备好了。

translation: There is no such thing.
transcript: 没有这样的事情。

translation: And when you wait, you fail.
transcript: 这时就是你就输了。

translation: Okay, what I just talked about was a higher level.
transcript: 好，这是更高的一个境界。

translation: We all know how complicated it used to be to upgrade big systems and software, such as Microsoft, right?
transcript: 我们大家都知道我们等微软，我们以前的大系统大软件升级一下多么复杂，对不对？

translation: For example, how hard it was to upgrade to Windows 8.
transcript: 要升到win8前面要关闭多么的辛苦。

translation: What’s that?
transcript: 那个是什么？

translation: That's a perfect big software made by tens of thousands of engineers.
transcript: 那个是完美的，那么多几千几万的工程师做出来的这个大软件。

translation: Did it wait until it was ready?
transcript: 等待好了ready吗？

translation: Are you ready?
transcript: Are you ready?

translation: Ready!
transcript: Ready！

translation: Get launched!
transcript: 出货！

translation: Get paid!
transcript: 给钱！

translation: That's the old software thinking, right?
transcript: 对不对，这是原来的软件思维？

translation: But in today's new era of mobile Internet, software engineers unveil a new development idea called iterative upgrade.
transcript: 但在我们今天互联新的互联网时代，新的移动互联网时代工程师们，新的开发思路叫迭代更新。

translation: It means that as long as you have right ideas, interesting ideas, just make their debut recklessly.
transcript: 只要你这个思路是正确的，只要你这个想法是有趣的，不管三七二十一最有趣的东西往前抛。

translation: We all know WeChat and I'm sure you remember it just had a very simple function that was "Hold to Talk" at its initial stage.
transcript: 大家一定记得微信，微信最早的时候就是一个有一技之长，点一下说话的东西，很简单。

translation: But now look at it, through repeated upgrades, it integrates ever richer functions including Licaitong, Tenpay and Didi Taxi.
transcript: 但它现在看看，叠床架屋、理财通啊、财付通、滴滴打车。

translation: It has become more and more well-rounded and versatile, becoming the leader of its kind in China’s mobile Internet market.
transcript: 变得越来越重，变得越来越丰富，成为我们移动互联网的现在的第一入口。

translation: We can imagine how powerful a tool and a mobile Internet portal it will be in the future.
transcript: 我们可以想想它将来是一个多么巨无霸的一个一个工具，一个移动互联网的巨大的一个入口。

translation: What made it possible?
transcript: 这是什么？

translation: It’s the iterative upgrade.
transcript: 这就是迭代更新。

translation: It's not just the language of software engineers, but also of us ordinary people.
transcript: 大家已经很习惯这不仅是一个工程师的语言。

translation: You could look at your Iphone, everyone has one and you can feel how easy it is to upgrade your iphone system.
transcript: 大家现在看看手机上iphone，对不对，每位都有iphone，iphone升级多么简单。

translation: If you think in the old way and take three or five years to make everything ready and perfect, the world has already changed when you launch something.
transcript: 如果你再用过去的思维，全部都准备好了全部都完美了，等待了三年、五年再出街的时候世界都已经变化。

translation: Iterative upgrade not only requires us to overcome procrastination, but also urges us to take the initiative to use our comparative advantages which may not be perfect.
transcript: 迭代更新我们不仅是要解决拖延症，我们要主动地去把也许不那么完美，但是我有锐利的一点优势相对优势抛出去。

translation: This is the active thinking in the era of mobile Internet.
transcript: 这是移动互联网时代我们的主动思考性。

translation: From these examples I've shared above, I want to say that we can use some of the inspirations from our work in our lives.
transcript: 当我们从工作当我们做做作软件里面得到一些启发，看看我们的人生。

translation: Today, I’m standing here, as the first speaker, capturing your most attention, no matter where are you from.
transcript: 今天我站在这里，占据大家第一个的最好的注意力，因为大家坐下来今天从各个地方来到这里，第一个开场的人赢得了你们的目光。

translation: So I have a bonus for being a brick, right?
transcript: 所以我是有砖块的红利的，对不对？

translation: Just remember to be those who always dare to do things, even if you're not perfect.
transcript: 所以呢，从小到大要敢于去做事情，哪怕你是粗糙的。

translation: I’m JF, which is inspired by I'm MT.
transcript: 所以从我叫JF，这是我叫MT发挥的哦。

translation: So, it is the “iterative upgrade” that made me look like this and then made me what I am today.
transcript: 我叫JF，迭代更新对吧，长到这个样子，然后再变成我今天这个样子。

translation: There are some things in our life that you are not ready yet to do, and some things may not be perfect.
transcript: 所以在我们人生的过程当中有一些事你还没准备好，有一些事也许你不那么完美。

translation: Then should you just delay it?
transcript: 是不是你就不去做了？

translation: Are you not going to be the first speaker on the stage to give a speech?
transcript: 你是不是不站在这舞台第一个来成为大家的演讲者呢？

translation: No, because I am working on the mobile Internet now, I got an inspiration from it.
transcript: 没有，因为我现在在从事移动互联网，所以我从这里面得到了一种启发。

translation: Should our life be iteratively upgraded too?
transcript: 我们的人生是不是也应该迭代更新呢？

translation: Because we dare to stand here today, because today, we are always ready!
transcript: 因为我们今天敢于站出来，因为今天，我们时刻准备着！

translation: Thank you all!
transcript: 谢谢大家！
